description.def: We are specialized in manufacturing and customizing any kind of automobile parts as per customer requirements and CAD drawings. We are using excellent quality raw materials and advanced technology to ensure the high durability and anti-corrosive property of automobile parts. All our automobile parts are compliance with the international standards and industry norms. Our offered range of automobile parts are widely appreciated by customer in domestic as well as international market for its accurate dimension, precious design, high performance and flawless finish. Automobile Parts are widely used in all kind of vehicles and automobiles as replacement and repairing parts. Our automobile parts are preciously tested and inspected before its final delivery to ensure defect free and high-performance product. We are capable to manufacture standard as well as custom automobile parts in-terms of dimension, size, material, shape as per customer specification & requirements.

description.def: We are leading manufacturer of CNC Turned Components providing customized products to achieve the desired specialization in the production of parts. These components are widely used in Engineering, Aerospace, Medical, Agricultural and Machine Tool Industries. We are well known in the market for our various excellent products. We manufacture these components as per client's customized requirements. We manufacture these parts using high-grade raw materials like steel, stainless steel, brass, copper, aluminium and many more as per the industrial standards and customer specifications.

description.def: Earthing System is very essential to be properly designed & installed to safeguard both lives & the equipment. Sometimes it happens that though the earthing system is installed, current leakage is felt & short circuit may happen. To avoid this a correct Earthing System embracing correct earthing accessories is very important to take care of. Corrosion resistance, conductivity and mechanical strength are essential considerations in earthing accessory design to ensure an earthing system remains operative for many years. Earthing Accessories have high quality copper alloy material which provide wanted strength to the part to ensure its proper mechanism.

description.def: We are manufacturing all Kinds of Brass Electrical Components, Brass Electrical Parts and Brass Electrical Fittings like Electrical Plug Pins, Sockets Pins, Brass Electrical Components, Brass Terminal Block, Brass Connectors, Brass Contacts and more. Brass Electrical Components are consumed in various applications like Toggle Switches, Modular Switches, Switchgears, Fuse Switches, Plug Pins & Sockets and many Electrical & Electronics Equipment or Parts. Brass Electrical Components for various industries including Power Generation, Electronic Industry, Solar Energy, Automotive Industry, Medical Industry, Electrical and Engineering Assembly.

description.def: We are specialized in Manufacturing of Brass Forging Parts. We can Manufacture any type of Brass Forging Components, Brass Forging Parts, Brass Forging Fittings, Brass Forged and Machined Parts, Brass and Gunmetal Die Casting Components for various industries including Water Valve and Pipe Fittings, Plumbing and Sanitary Fittings, Agricultural Equipment, Automotive Parts, LPG and CNG Valve Fittings, Electrical and Engineering Assembly. We have a Unique Manufacturing Facility to develop Brass Forging Parts as per customer’s designs and requirements.

description.def: The wide range of Brass Inserts include threaded molding inserts, ultrasonic molding inserts, knurled molding inserts, molding inserts for plastic, wood molding inserts and more. The range of standard and high quality molding inserts designed to molded into the plastic, wood or any molded components. The brass used in the manufacturing of these brass inserts is of optimum quality that ensures high durability, tensile strength and resistance to corrosion. High temperature bearing capacity has also made these brass inserts ideal for various industrial applications.

info.name: Special Features of Brass Inserts
info: Threads as per International Go & Not Go Standards.
Deep Groove for maximum Pull Out Resistance.
Knurling Available: » Diamond » Straight » Unidirectional » Both blind and through brass inserts are available with no minimum Qty.

These LPG & Gas parts are available for various fitting needs in different sizes, shapes, designs and thickness. These parts are available with international quality standards and features for widely used in variety of applications. We also manufacture and export various types of ass LPG & Gas Parts exactly similar to clients drawing or sample.

description.def: We are engaged in offering a wide range of Brass Turned Components to our clients at a reasonable cost. Our turned components are made using quality raw material such as high and fine grade brass to assure quality and reliability. We manufacture all types of Brass turned components depending upon client’s requirement for application in any industry. The range of Brass Turned Components find wide application in machine building, automobile, hydraulics and general engineering industry. Our turned components are tested on numerous parameters to assure it on counts of quality.

description.def: We provide High-Quality Brass Fasteners with variety of types. Generally, Fasteners are hardware components that mechanically joins two or more elements together. Brass Fasteners are easily removable without any damages the joining components. They are made from brass, mild steel, stainless steel and other material composition. Brass Fasteners are defined various types such as Screw, Washer, Anchor, Nuts, Rivets, Inserts, Bolts and many more.

info.name: Type of Nuts
info: Hex Nut | Round Nut | Hexagonal | Nylon Insert Lock | Nylon Insert Jam Lock | Wing | Cap | Acorn | Flange | Tee | Square | Coupling | Slotted | Castle | Insert Nut
